Articles.Content: Hello all! Ive managed to build a few things.... I love ksp, its so nerdy I laughed soo hard when I built my first rocket. No idea what I was doing at the time I just threw parts together in what I thought was a space worthy craft, upon my first press of the spacebar EVERYTHING happened at the same time! Like a huge firework with parachutes deploying uncontrollably... Ive built a space station so hope to get some pics up to share!

So from not even knowing about staging to assembling a space station. Wow. You learned docking that fast?

Welcome to the dark side. A word of advice: Do NOT try to replicate Whackjob. You will melt your computer.
Welcome to the forums! Enjoy your stay!

Hello Captain! Uh it took me a week to work out how to dock...It just messed my brain up lol. im getting better at docking now.. no way would i consider myself an efficient Kerbanaught keeping to numbers... if it looks ok and not exploading im happy
